Package org.jlab.mya.stream

Class LabeledEnumStream

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.mya.stream.EventStream<T>
org.jlab.mya.stream.WrappedStream<LabeledEnumEvent,IntEvent>
org.jlab.mya.stream.LabeledEnumStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel
public class LabeledEnumStream extends WrappedStream<LabeledEnumEvent,IntEvent>
Wraps an IntEventStream and provides LabelEnumEvents by assigning enumeration labels to integer values.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public LabeledEnumEvent read() throws IOException
      Read the next event from the stream. Generally you'll want to iterate over the stream using a while loop.
      Specified by:
      read in class EventStream<LabeledEnumEvent>
      Returns:
      The next event or null if End-Of-Stream reached
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to read the next event
